data.body:
replace the word 'Wave' with 'Scene'

Remove the title 'Orchestration view', it's unnecesasry.

Replace Apply Wave Beats with 'Approve Board'

Add new button 'Approve And Shoot' with a video camera icon that is disabled until the planning is complete.
